page.title: The Royal Seal of Mahamudra Volume One

revision.text:
{{DRL Metadata |publicationtype=Book |citation=The Third Khamtrul Rinpoche, Ngawang Kunga Tenzin. The Royal Seal of Mahamudra Volume One: A Guidebook for the Realization of Coemergence. Translated by Gerardo Abboud. Boston & London: Snow Lion Publications/Shambhala, 2014. |author=The Third Khamtrul Rinpoche, Ngawang Kunga Tenzin |translator=Abboud, Gerardo |fulltitle=The Royal Seal of Mahamudra Volume One: A Guidebook for the Realization of Coemergence |place=Boston & London |publisher=Snow Lion Publications |pubdate=2014 |edition=1st edition |editiontype=Hardcover |isbn=9781559394376 |pubsubtype=Translation |topic=Philosophy |keywords=Meditative practices; Meditation; stability; insight; Drukpa Kagyu lineage; coemergence; mahamudra;eighteenth-century; Tibetan master; Ngawang Kunga Tenzin;Third Khamtrul Rinpoche; Khamtrul, 3rd; spiritual exercises; clear realization; ever-present, nondual nature of mind; Mah훮mudr훮; Abboud, G. |index=Yes |totalpages=352 |glossary=No glossary |notes=Endnotes |language=English |translation=Tibetan to English |formatofsourcetext=None |canonical=No |noncanonical=Yes |sourceauthor=[[Khamtrul, 3rd]] |sourcetitle=[[Phyag rgya chen po lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi dngos gzhi'i khrid yig zab don rgya mtsho'i lam tshang bla na med pa]] |citationofsourcetexts=[[Khamtrul, 3rd]]. [[Phyag rgya chen po lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi dngos gzhi'i khrid yig zab don rgya mtsho'i lam tshang bla na med pa]]. [http://www.tbrc.org/#!rid=W1KG4190 TBRC W1KG4190]. tashijong, palampur, h.p., India: Sungrab nyamso gyunphel parkhang, tibetan craft community, 1974. |lcclassification=BQ8921.M35 N3313 2014 |lcsubjects=I. page.title: The Royal Seal of Mahamudra Volume One/Table of Contents

revision.comment: Created page with "*Foreword by His Holiness the Dalai Lama vii *Foreword by the Ninth Khamtrul Rinpoche, Shedrup Nyima ix *Translator's Preface xi *THE SUPREME COMPLETE PATH OF THE OCEAN OF PRO..."
revision.text:
*Foreword by His Holiness the Dalai Lama vii *Foreword by the Ninth Khamtrul Rinpoche, Shedrup Nyima ix *Translator's Preface xi *THE SUPREME COMPLETE PATH OF THE OCEAN OF PROFOUND MEANING *Prologue 3 **1. Why Meditation Is Indispensable 5 **2. The Key Points of Physical Posture 21 **3. The Key Points of Voice 35 **4. Settling the Mind 41 **5. Eliminating the Faults of the Mind 69 **6. Using the Mind as the Path 97 **7. The Yoga of One-Pointedness 131 **8. Eliminating the Faults of Shamatha 159 **9. Refining Shamatha 169 **10. Sustaining Shamatha 209 **11. The Yoga of Simplicity 219 **12. How to Practice Vipashyana 233 **13. The Fruition of Vipashyana 261 **14. The Yoga of One Taste 275 **15. The Yoga of Nonmeditation 287 *Appendix: Outline of the Text 293 *Notes 301 *Works Cited by the Author 309 *Index 313
<noinclude>{{DRL subpage basecategories}}</noinclude>

{{#ask: [[Category:Books]] [[{{PAGENAME}}]] | ?translator | ?author | ?fulltitle | ?series | ?place# | ?publisher | ?pubdate | ?lcclassification | format=template | template=citation | limit=1 }}
The scans of this item are available at the bottom of this page. If you would like to request that portions of this text be added to the DRL, Email the research department here: [mailto:Research@tsadra.org?Subject=RE:%20Text%20Request Request a text from the Research Department]. To check to see if the physical copy of this text is available for purchase, click the ISBN number in the info-box and follow the links. If this text is not easily available for purchase, and you would like to request a digital version, you may likewise contact the Research Department. Remember that any digital book or other content shared through the DRL is meant for Tsadra Staff and Fellows '''ONLY'''.
